properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) WHERE BOARD_NAME = ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN REPLY_CONTENT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS "RESULTSTATUS", BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN REPLY R on B.BOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO WHERE BOARD_NAME = '문의' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?;
